title: Losing LP (-LP IS A THING LOL?) because of the champion selection crashing
body:
So....i got into a champion selection in ranked, and near the end of the bans, my client just froze, windows closed it and now im in a 30 minutes ban with -10 LP, so i'm done fucked now? is that it? -10 LP means i'm getting demoted next lose? or it means that 10 LP just wont be there when i win?
Anyways, WTFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF.

replies.body:
Yes, negative LP is in fact a thing. It sounds like you may have dodged multiple queues, since it takes 2 or more dodges to get a 10 LP loss and a 30-minute low-priority queue. In this last instance, your disconnection from the matchmaking service (client freeze) counted as a dodge by [the system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging). You likely won't be demoted from another match, but I strongly recommend we resolve your problem causing the crashes before you continue to play ranked.

Most of these disconnections are caused by the client losing its connection to the server entirely. Most of the time, local network settings are to blame for this happening. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
